void createMarkupTrans() { CustTable custTable = this.custTable_CustAccount();
Markup::insertMarkupTrans(HeadingLine::Heading, MarkupModuleType::Cust, this, this.CustAccount, custTable.MarkupGroup, custTable.Currency, DirPartyTable::findRec(custTable.Party).LanguageId, '', custTable.MarkupGroup, false, true, custTable.DlvMode ); }
